basics.name: Marcin Ostaszewski

keywords: Used Figma for design and UX work

work.summary: Medallia is in top 5 worldwide companies for Customer Experience...
work.name: Medallia
highlights: Working as front-end dev in an international team of 20+ (Jira, GitHub, Figma)
I am implementing new views and features, fixing bugs, working on-call (React, TypeScript, MobX, Redux, StyledComponents, AngularJS, Jest)

work.name: Magnetic Point (software house)
highlights: I was working on various projects, mainly in an international, 20+ persons SCRUM team, for a big British e-commerce company (Jira, InVision)
I was closely cooperating with BEs and UIs (SalesForce, JS, jQuery, HTML, SASS, Zeplin, Jest)
I was reviewing front-end and back-end code changes (Azure, Bitbucket, Git)

work.name: AZA Group (e-commerce)
highlights: I was an efficient member of a 15+ team in a SCRUM / Kanban project (Azure, Teams)
I was developing new features, fixing bugs, doing peer code reviews (JS, SASS, Cake PHP, Azure, Git)
I was refactoring and improving an administrative app (ReactJS, Redux, TypeScript)

work.name: Marcel (software for labs)
highlights: I improved many features of a web app's UI and graphic design (HTML, CSS, JS, Jinja, AngularJS)
I wrote over a hundred of E2E tests of an AngularJS web app (Selenium Webdriver, JS)
I was developing an internal templating system for medical documentation

work.name: Mashkor (software dev team)
highlights: As only front-end dev in a team of 5, I implemented full database admininstration panel, for a delivery on demand startup in Kuwait (JS, HTML, SAAS, REST, Bootstrap)
